reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects Usage Data automatically, including information like the Device's Internet Protocol address, browser type, pages visited, time spent on pages, unique device identifiers, mobile device information (such as type, unique ID, IP address, operating system, browser), and other diagnostic data.

content: mobile device information (type, unique ID, IP address, operating system, browser)

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the specific details mentioned in the privacy policy where it explicitly states the type of data collected under Usage Data.
reply.reference: Usage Data may include information such as Your Device's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that You visit, the time and date of Your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data. ...When You access the Service by or through a mobile device, We may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device You use, Your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of Your mobile device, Your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser You use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data. URL: https://www.privacypolicies.com/live/7e88779a-8abd-43fa-b7d8-4764cb4b6388

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, users can opt out of data collection or delete data. Users have the right to delete or request assistance in deleting the Personal Data collected about them. The service provides the ability to delete certain information within the service, update, amend, or delete information through account settings or by contacting the company. However, certain information may need to be retained under legal obligations.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users have the right to delete or request assistance in deleting their personal data collected by the service. It also mentions the ways in which users can manage their information, indicating that users can opt out of data collection or delete data.
reply.reference: You have the right to delete or request that We assist in deleting the Personal Data that We have collected about You. Our Service may give You the ability to delete certain information about You from within the Service. You may update, amend, or delete Your information at any time by signing in to Your Account, if you have one, and visiting the account settings section that allows you to manage Your personal information. You may also contact Us to request access to, correct, or delete any personal information that You have provided to Us. Please note, however, that We may need to retain certain information when we have a legal obligation or lawful basis to do so. URL: https://www.privacypolicies.com/live/7e88779a-8abd-43fa-b7d8-4764cb4b6388

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with service providers and third-party companies or individuals employed to facilitate the service.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions sharing data with service providers and third-party companies or individuals for facilitating the service, which indicates the types of third parties with whom the app shares data.
reply.reference: Service Provider means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used. URL: https://www.privacypolicies.com/live/7e88779a-8abd-43fa-b7d8-4764cb4b6388
